comments:
3.2RC3

- I replaced a project with "Latest from HEAD"
- got this (no more steps)

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.jobs 4 2 2006-05-10 12:40:51.197
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Updating revision histories".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.operations.RemoteLogOperation$LogEntryCache.getFullPath(RemoteLogOperation.java:129)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.operations.RemoteLogOperation$LogEntryCache.clearEntries(RemoteLogOperation.java:219)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.subscriber.LogEntryCacheUpdateHandler.remove(LogEntryCacheUpdateHandler.java:310)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.subscriber.LogEntryCacheUpdateHandler.change(LogEntryCacheUpdateHandler.java:379)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.subscriber.LogEntryCacheUpdateHandler.change(LogEntryCacheUpdateHandler.java:367)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.subscriber.LogEntryCacheUpdateHandler.updateCache(LogEntryCacheUpdateHandler.java:272)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.subscriber.LogEntryCacheUpdateHandler.doDispatchEvents(LogEntryCacheUpdateHandler.java:251)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.core.BackgroundEventHandler.dispatchEvents(BackgroundEventHandler.java:354)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.core.BackgroundEventHandler.processEvents(BackgroundEventHandler.java:334)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.core.BackgroundEventHandler$1.run(BackgroundEventHandler.java:173)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)

This occurs in change set mode when a local change is in the sync view and a sync detects a remote change. The fix is safe (i.e. just the addition of a null check) so I will look into getting it into RC4.

This NPE was surfaced by a fix put into RC3. The side effect is that some incoming changes will not appear in incoming mode of the sync view when in Change Set mode. The fix is trivial (and is attached in a patch). The method being called is only called from that one place so there are no other places that need to be modified.
